right.text: She became suicidal more than once, and more than once decided that, because I'm a guy and because guys have always only wanted her for sex,

left.text: Things deteriorated from there, though. She went through a lot of crap, got fired from her job, ended up on the streets...

left.text: Then November came. I introduced her to the family, we had a great time... Then a former lover of hers died.
